mapper.select: /* 인적사항 조회 */ SELECT i.insurance_code, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone_number, u.user_addr_desc FROM tb_insurance AS i INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.user_id = #{loginId} AND i.insurance_code = #{insuranceCode};

/* 보험 정보 조회(로그인아이디) */ SELECT i.insurance_code, i.goods_code, g.goods_name, i.payment_code, i.rental_code, i.insurance_available, SUBSTRING(i.insurance_sign_up_time, 1, 10) as insurance_sign_up_time, r.rental_end_date, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone_number, u.user_addr_desc FROM tb_insurance AS i LEFT JOIN tb_goods AS g ON i.goods_code = g.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_rental AS r ON i.rental_code = r.rental_code INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.user_id = #{loginId} ORDER BY i.insurance_code;

/* 보험 정보 조회(보험코드) */ SELECT i.insurance_code, i.goods_code, g.goods_name, i.payment_code, i.rental_code, i.insurance_available, SUBSTRING(i.insurance_sign_up_time, 1, 10) as insurance_sign_up_time, r.rental_end_date, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone_number, u.user_addr_desc FROM tb_insurance AS i LEFT JOIN tb_goods AS g ON i.goods_code = g.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_rental AS r ON i.rental_code = r.rental_code INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.insurance_code = #{insuranceCode} ORDER BY i.insurance_code;
mapper.insert: /* 보상금 접수증 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_insurance_bill_detail ( insurance_bill_detail_code, insurance_code, user_id, goods_code, payment_code, accident_date, accident_type, accident_content, insurance_evidence, bank_name, account_holder, account_number, request_date ) VALUES ( #{insuranceBillDetailCode}, #{userId}, #{goodsCode}, #{paymentCode}, #{accidentDate}, #{accidentType}, #{accidentContent}, #{insuranceEvidence}, #{bankName}, #{accountHolder}, #{accountNumber}, #{requestDate} );

INSERT INTO tb_insurance_bill ( insurance_bill_code, user_id, insurance_code, insurance_bill_detail_code, insurance_bill_state_code, insurance_bill_modify_date ) VALUES ( #{insuranceBillCode}, #{userId}, #{insuranceCode}, #{insuranceBillDetailCode}, #{insuranceBillStateCode}, #{insuranceBillModifyDate} );
mapper.select: /* 보상금 청구서 조회(보험청구서코드) */ SELECT ibd.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone_number, u.user_addr_desc, ibd.accident_type, ibd.accident_date, ibd.accident_content, ibd.bank_name, ibd.account_holder, ibd.account_number, ibd.insurance_code, ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code, ibd.goods_code, SUBSTRING(ibd.request_date, 1, 10) as request_date, g.goods_name, ib.insurance_bill_state_code, ibs.insurance_bill_state_name FROM tb_insurance_bill_detail AS ibd LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON ibd.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ibd.goods_code = g.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_insurance_bill as ib ON ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code = ib.insurance_bill_detail_code INNER JOIN tb_insurance_bill_state AS ibs ON ib.insurance_bill_state_code = ibs.insurance_bill_state_code WHERE ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code = #{insuranceBillDetailCode};

/* 보상금 접수증 조회(보험코드) */ SELECT ibd.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone_number, u.user_addr_desc, ibd.accident_type, ibd.accident_date, ibd.accident_content, ibd.bank_name, ibd.account_holder, ibd.account_number, ibd.insurance_code, ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code, ibd.goods_code, SUBSTRING(ibd.request_date, 1, 10) as request_date, g.goods_name FROM tb_insurance_bill_detail AS ibd LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON ibd.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ibd.goods_code = g.goods_code WHERE ibd.insurance_code = #{insuranceCode};

/* 보상금 접수증 조회 */ SELECT ib.insurance_bill_code, ib.insurance_bill_detail_code, ib.insurance_code, g.goods_code, g.goods_name, ibs.insurance_bill_state_name, SUBSTRING(ib.insurance_bill_modify_date, 1, 10) as insurance_bill_modify_date FROM tb_insurance_bill AS ib INNER JOIN tb_insurance_bill_state AS ibs ON ib.insurance_bill_state_code = ibs.insurance_bill_state_code INNER JOIN tb_insurance_bill_detail AS ibd ON ib.insurance_bill_detail_code = ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON ibd.goods_code = g.goods_code WHERE ib.user_id = #{loginId} ORDER BY ib.insurance_bill_code;

/* 보상급 지급내역 조회 */ SELECT ibd.insurance_code, ip.insurance_payout_code, ip.insurance_bill_detail_code, g.goods_name, ip.insurance_payout_price, SUBSTRING(ip.insurance_payout_date, 1, 10) as insurance_payout_date FROM tb_insurance_payout AS ip LEFT JOIN tb_insurance_bill_detail AS ibd ON ip.insurance_bill_detail_code = ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code LEFT JOIN tb_insurance AS i ON i.insurance_code = ibd.insurance_code INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON i.goods_code = g.goods_code WHERE ibd.user_id = #{loginId} ORDER BY ip.insurance_payout_code;
